article.title: Telephonics Receives $9.5 Million Order for Additional MH-60R Radar Spares
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Telephonics Corporation has received a $9.5 million order from Lockheed Martin to fund long-lead purchases of subsystem spares for the AN/APS-147 Multi-Mode Radar and Identification Friend or Foe Interrogator System.
